info.name: Crypt compatibility
info.author: ViaThinkSoft
info.descriptionHTML:
This plugin implements compatibility to verify existing crypt password hashes.

Attention: This auth plugin is meant to be used as "verify only" plugin (e.g. if you want to transfer /etc/shadow passwords to OIDplus).
Please don't make this auth plugin to your default plugin, because it does not the best secure hashes!
